title: A most excellent and heauenly sermon vpon the 23. chapter of the Gospell by Saint Luke. The text. Luke 23.28. Weepe not for me, but weepe for your selues.
author: Playfere, Thomas, 1561?-1609.
publisher: Printed [by J. Orwin], for Andrew Wise,
notes: Later editions published as: The meane in mourning.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
